DocAttribute.Name: RepresentationMaps
DocAttribute.Documentation: List of unique representation maps. Each representation map describes a block definition of the shape of the product style. By providing more than one representation map, a multi-view block definition can be given.

DocAttribute.Name: Tag
DocAttribute.Documentation: The tag (or label) identifier at the particular type of a product, e.g. the article number (like the EAN). It is the identifier at the specific level.

DocWhereRule.Name: WR41
DocWhereRule.Documentation: The product style, if assigned to an object, shall only be assigned to object of type IfcProduct or IfcProxy.
